author: cbs8
title: DJ Snake Releases New Single, "Middle," Featuring Bipolar Sunshine, Today Via All Participating Digital Retailers
text:
Interscope Records
"MIDDLE" IS FIRST SINGLE FROM GRAMMY-NOMINATED FRENCH DJ AND PRODUCER'S UPCOMING DEBUT ALBUM, COMING THIS WINTER FROM INTERSCOPE RECORDS
SANTA MONICA, Calif. , Oct. 16, Grammy-nominated French DJ and producer DJ Snake releases new single, "Middle," available now for streaming here and digital download here . The track features vocalist Bipolar Sunshine - a pseudonym for former Kid British co-vocalist Adio Marchant . "Middle" is the first single from DJ Snake's upcoming debut album, which is coming from Interscope Records this winter.
Over the summer DJ Snake (AKA William Grigahcine) scored three simultaneous hits on the Billboard Hot 100: the gold-certified "Get Low" with Dillon Francis , the platinum-certified " Lean On ," with Major Lazer (feat. MÃ˜ ), which also hit No. 1 on the Top 40 chart and is the 11 th Most Shazamed song of all time, and the platinum-certified "You Know You Like It" with AlunaGeorge.
"You Know You Like It" peaked at No. 2 on the Billboard Rhythmic charts, No. 7 at Top 40, and No. 13 on the Billboard Hot 100. It was also the most Shazamed song in the U.S. for five straight weeks over the summer. It has also racked up over 141 million Spotify plays and over 63 million YouTube views. The remix was the official follow-up to DJ Snake's previous single "Turn Down for What" with Lil Jon , which was the biggest electronic dance song of last year. The track climbed to No. 1 on Billboard 's Hot Dance/Electronic Songs and Rhythmic charts and No. 4 on the Hot 100, and has sold more than five million copies in the U.S. alone. The music video for "Turn Down For What," which won an MTV VMA for "Best Direction," has racked up more than 300 million views on VEVO.
For more, please visit:
